item.title: Research Institute for Social and Gender Studies
item.description: Founded in 2000 on the basis of the Kazakh National Womenâ€™s Teacher Training University, Research Institute for Social and Gender Studies is dedicated to promoting gender and social equality through the implementation of multidisciplinary research projects and social initiatives. Research and publications are particularly focused on education and teaching in Kazakhstan.
